text: The Miners of Donetsk () is a 1951 Soviet drama movie directed by Leonid Lukov.ДОНЕЦКИЕ ШАХТЕРЫДонецкие шахтеры (1951) It stars Aleksei Gribov, A. Mansvetov, and G. Pasechnik. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1951 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Leonid Lukov
title: The Miners of Donetsk
